title: 数据库配置
text: 1.时区配置获取时区：show variables like ‘%time_zone%’; 设置为北京：set time_zone=’+8:00’; 验证：select now();

title: 查询语句
text: 1.多表查询与日期比较 select o.username,o.oid,o.allmoney,o.paytime,d.aid,d.bookcount,d.salePrice,b.isbn,b.bname,b.author,b.pubdate,b.press,b.price,b.descr,b.pic,b.bkaccount from torder o,torderdetail d,tbook b where o.oid = d.oid and b.isbn = d.isbn and o.paytime >= str_to_date(‘2017-10-14’,’%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s’) order by aid limit 0 ,3; 2.连续增长 insert into torderdetail (aid,oid,isbn,bookcount,salePrice) values ((select IFNULL(max(t.aid),0)+1 from torderdetail t),66,’is001’,5,5);

title: hello js
text: 你好这是我的第一篇文章:)

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
